Class FriendRecommendation

  • public class FriendRecommendation
extends DBObject
    Author:
    Sydney This is a simple recommendation system based on the number of shared friends between two users.

      • setFriendRecommendationTable

        public boolean setFriendRecommendationTable()
        Setup the FriendRecommendation Table based on friendship table. This should be called only once for initiate the table.
        Returns:
        true if the FriendRecommendationTable is set up correctly.
